name: THE BLACK ROSE CAFE
top_review: this place is good for yummy hangover foods there are lots of options for food and drinks i love the cheese egg sandwich and the purple juice the menu is not in english but the staff is very helpful there is a toilet and wifi but i bring a bag and take the food to go

name: Sunday Morning 星期天早上
top_review: if you buy food you cant use wifi why ridiculous but whatever its not like ill come again gf booked some seats and ask the clerk several times for seats they gave away the seat each time someone is coming when theres empty seat and we took it they said its booked by a couple im struggling not to cuss food doesnt taste that good either at least the toilet is clean jeez

name: 河童家 かっぱや
top_review: i saw an article recommended on the internet and found that it was close to home so i checked in immediately the next day we arrived at the store around 430 that day sunday the only cakes left in the store were basque i originally came here for the strawberry cake but i didnt expect that their basque cake is super delicious but i havent eaten many of them it can be said to be the best i have ever tasted it is of the standard of a specialty store but it should be noted that the curry rice does not contain meat those who like meat should pay attention but this does not reduce its deliciousness at all in summary its a perfect score

name: 冰斗喫甜(全預訂制、無內用)
top_review: if i could give them a zero star i would definitely do that very bad customer service worst service i have ever had highly recommended to not go here its was nothing special and definitely not worth paying so much money for crepes layered with frosting so disappointed

name: A.B.D. Coffee & Life
top_review: if you are looking for a cozy homey cafe to chill on a sunday morning here is the place simple food menu danish toasts hotdogs but in great taste coffee is nice after all its the passion of life thats embedded in every details making this place most attractive

name: 金福咖啡 JinfuCoffee
top_review: what a nice random discovery great coffee great tunes and good dessert the staff at this coffee shop truly know how to brew an excellent handdripped cup so many coffee shops fail at this so kudos to this place the tunes playing at this coffee shop are fantastic from radiohead the police the smiths and more i didnt hear a single bad song in my time here the environment as a whole is comfy relaxing the kind of place youll want to go to escape and be with yourself the desert was delicious a little more frozen than i would have liked which made it a bit of a pain to eat with the tiny fork provided but the taste was there nonetheless the girls handling the counter seem nice one of them is able to speak enough english to get you by in case you were to need it

name: 尋常生活
top_review: im so so happy to have found this place its very relaxed especially the outside area with lots of plants reminds me of sitting in a quite café in europe the food is super tasty too after having tried so much quiche in taiwan this is finally the first one that uses proper ingredients instead of some asian substitutes that are probably easier to get the salad is fresh and crunchy and instead of heavy caesar salad dressing that seems to be so popular in taiwan its just a bit of nice summery balsamic vinegar and oil the scone goes very well with coffee oh and the coffee also really really good they apparently also serve oat milk which i saw too late but which is yet another plus staff is also very friendly fully recommended

name: 秘徑咖啡Alley's cafe
top_review: reasonably priced food very good atmosphere quiet even when mainly full music is at a low level and not distracting service speed was excellent limited menu of main dishes predominantly risotto and pasta food quality is slightly above average access is not easy by car since its off the main road through a lane and an alley very close to wanlong mrt station 捷運萬隆站 an easy walk very clean and well maintained good lighting some staff speak english

name: JOHNDOECAFÉ-無名氏咖啡
top_review: one of the best coffee shops i have been in taipei both to eat and chat with friends and to workstudy the staff is very friendly and the service is really good the drinks and food are also amazing i highly recommend the crispy fried chicken the iced cinnamon cappuccino and the chocolate marshmallow toast the coffee cups are large the presentation is really good and the taste is even better additionally they have student discounts for students of some selected universities such as national taiwan university
